Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC WHERE IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY CENTRALCCODI DESC
INSERT INTO CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC ( CENTRALCCODI, PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :CENTRALCCODI, :PROYCODI, :FECPUESTAOPE, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )
UPDATE CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, FECPUESTAOPE = :FECPUESTAOPE, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE CENTRALCCODI = :CENTRALCCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC ORDER BY CENTRALCCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
